ValidMind API — Swagger2Markdown

Version: 1.0

Security

Bearer Auth

apiKey API Key
In header
Name Authorization
Description Example: Bearer eyXXXXXXXX (for now login in postman and paste the token here)

oauth2

oauth2 OAuth 2.0
Flow implicit
Authorization URL https://dev-bpojk7up.us.auth0.com/authorize?audience=https://api.test.vm.validmind.ai
Scopes
openid Grants openid access
profile Grants profile access
email Grants email access

groups

Groups related operations

/api/v1/groups

GET

Summary

Retrieve a paginated list of groups from the logged-in user’s organization

Description

Fetch a paginated list of groups from the logged-in user’s organization. Query Parameters:

  • page: Page number for pagination (default is 1).
  • limit: Limit the number of items to be returned (default is 100).
  • sort_by: Sort by one of the available fields: ‘name’, ‘created_at’, ‘updated_at’ (default is ‘name’). # noqa
  • sort_order: Sort order, either ‘asc’ or ‘desc’ (default is ‘asc’).
  • search: Search term for groups, uses ILIKE on ‘name’.
  • is_default: Filter by default groups (true or false).
Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
page query Page number No integer
limit query Limit the number of items No integer
sort_by query Sort by this field No string
sort_order query Sort order No string
search query Search term using ILIKE on name No string
is_default query Is default group? No boolean
X-Fields header An optional fields mask No string (mask)
Responses
Code Description Schema
200 Successful retrieval of group list. PaginatedGroups
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
500 Internal Server Error.

POST

Summary

Create a new group in the logged user’s organization

Description

Create a new group in the logged user’s organization.

  • Validates name is unique.

Request Payload:

  • name: (required) The name of the group.
Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
payload body Yes PostGroup
Responses
Code Description
201 User successfully created.
400 Bad Request. Possible issues could be missing name in payload.
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
500 Internal Server Error.

/api/v1/groups/{cuid}

GET

Summary

Retrieve a specific group from the logged user’s organization by CUID

Description

Retrieve a specific group by CUID within the logged user’s organization.

Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
cuid path Yes string
Responses
Code Description
200 Success.
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
404 User not found.
500 Internal Server Error.

PATCH

Summary

Update specific group details in the logged user’s organization

Description

Update a specific group by CUID within the logged user’s organization.

  • Validates name is unique.

Request Payload:

  • name: (optional) New name of the group.

Partial updates are allowed.

Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
cuid path Yes string
payload body Yes PatchGroup
Responses
Code Description
200 Group updated successfully.
400 Bad Request. Possible issues could be missing or invalid fields in payload.
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
404 Group not found.
500 Internal Server Error.

DELETE

Summary

Delete a specific group from the logged user’s organization by CUID

Description

Delete a specific group by CUID within the logged user’s organization.

  • Removes all memberships
  • Removes all references it’s the resources:
    • inventory models
    • templates
    • workflows
  • And sets it to the organization’s default group.
Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
cuid path Yes string
Responses
Code Description
200 Group deleted successfully.
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
404 Group not found.
500 Internal Server Error.

/api/v1/groups/{cuid}/resources

GET

Summary

Get group resources by type

Description

Retrieves the resources in the group. Query Parameters:

  • type: (required) The type of the cuids of resources.
Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
cuid path Yes string
type query Resource type Yes string
Responses
Code Description
200 Successful retrieval of linked resources.
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
404 Group not found.
500 Internal Server Error.

DELETE

Summary

Remove the resources from the group

Description

Removes the resource from the group. Returns an array of resource cuids that were removed.

Request Payload:

  • type: (required) The type of the cuids of resources
  • resources: (required) List of resource cuids.
Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
cuid path Yes string
payload body Yes GroupResource
Responses
Code Description
200 Successful removal of group resource.
400 Bad Request. Possible issues could be missing or invalid fields in payload.
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
404 Group not found.
500 Internal Server Error.

POST

Summary

Add the resource link to the group

Description

Add resources to group. Request Payload:

  • type: (required) The type of the cuids of resources being managed on the group. Valid types are described in the model.
  • resources: (required) List of resource cuids.
Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
cuid path Yes string
payload body Yes GroupResource
Responses
Code Description
201 Group resource successfully linked.
400 Bad Request. Possible issues could be missing type or resources in payload.
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
404 Group not found.
500 Internal Server Error.

/api/v1/groups/{cuid}/users

GET

Summary

Retrieves the users in the group

Description

Retrieves the users in the group.

Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
cuid path Yes string
Responses
Code Description
200 Successful retrieval of group memberships.
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
404 Group not found.
500 Internal Server Error.

DELETE

Summary

Remove the users from the group

Description

Removes the users from the group. Returns an array of user cuids that were removed.

Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
cuid path Yes string
Responses
Code Description
200 Successful removal of group memberships.
400 Bad Request. Possible issues could be missing or invalid fields in payload.
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
404 Group not found.
500 Internal Server Error.

POST

Summary

Add the users to the group

Description

Add users to group. Request Payload:

  • users: (required) List of user cuids.
Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
cuid path Yes string
payload body Yes PostGroupMembership
Responses
Code Description
201 Group membership successfully created.
400 Bad Request. Possible issues could be missing users in payload.
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
404 Group not found.
500 Internal Server Error.

inventory-models

Inventory models related operations

/api/v1/inventory-models

GET

Summary

Retrieve inventory models within the logged user’s organization

Description

Retrieve inventory models within the logged user’s organization.

Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
page query Page number No integer
limit query Limit the number of items No integer
sort_by query Sort by this field No string
sort_order query Sort order No string
q query Search term using ILIKE on name No string
tiering query Tiering filter No string
business_units query Business unit filter (cuid csv) No string
status query Status filter (cuid csv) No string
uses query Uses filter No string
owners query Owners filter (cuid csv) No string
last_completed_imv_dates query Last completed imv dates filter (csv timestamp range values) No string
next_planned_imv_dates query Next planned imv dates filter (csv timestamp range values) No string
performance_rating query Performance rating filter (csv decimal range values) No string
pma_in_place query pma in place filter No string
X-Fields header An optional fields mask No string (mask)
Responses
Code Description Schema
200 Successful retrieval of inventory models list. PaginatedInventoryModels
401 Unauthorized.
500 Internal Server Error.

POST

Summary

Creates inventory model

Description

Creates inventory model. Requires Permissions:

  • resource: “Models” action: create_model

Requires Subscription Plan:

  • Feature.Name.CREATE_MODELS.value
Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
payload body Yes CreateInventoryModel
Responses
Code Description
201 Inventory model successfully created.
400 Bad Request.
401 Unauthorized.
402 Quota exceeded for current subscription plan.
500 Internal Server Error.

Responses

500 Internal Server Error.

organizations

Organizations related operations

/api/v1/organizations

POST

Summary

Creates organization and its dependencies:

Description

Creates organization and its dependencies, used during the onboarding process.

  • A new organization

  • Creates customer admin user and its sdk client, using customer_admin_email

  • A default group for the organization

  • Business units

  • Roles and Permissions

  • Workflows

  • Findings severities

  • Templates

  • Demo inventory model

  • Demo initial projects

  • Assigns a free subscription plan

Request Payload:

  • organization_name: (required) The name of the organization.
  • name: (required) The name of the user.
  • last_name: (required) The last name of the user.
  • job_title: (required) The job title of the user.
  • opted_in_for_newsletter: (optional) If the user opted in for newsletter.
  • opted_in_for_slack: (optional) If the user opted in for slack.
  • accepted_tyc: (optional) If the user accepted the terms and conditions.

Response Payload:

  • Error if the user already has an organization.
  • organization: The created organization.
Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
payload body Yes CreateOrganization
Responses
Code Description
201 Organization successfully created.
400 Bad Request. Possible issues could be missing name in payload or user has already an organization.
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
500 Internal Server Error.

organization_roles

Organization roles related operations

/api/v1/roles

GET

Summary

Retrieve a paginated list of organization roles from the logged-in user’s organization

Description

Fetch a paginated list of organization roles from the logged-in user’s organization. Query Parameters:

  • page: Page number for pagination (default is 1).
  • limit: Limit the number of items to be returned (default is 100).
  • sort_by: Sort by one of the available fields: ‘name’, ‘is_admin’, ‘created_at’, ‘updated_at’ (default is ‘name’). # noqa
  • sort_order: Sort order, either ‘asc’ or ‘desc’ (default is ‘asc’).
  • search: Search term for users, uses ILIKE on ‘name’.
Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
page query Page number No integer
limit query Limit the number of items No integer
sort_by query Sort by this field No string
sort_order query Sort order No string
search query Search term using ILIKE on name and email No string
X-Fields header An optional fields mask No string (mask)
Responses
Code Description Schema
200 Successful retrieval of roles list. PaginatedRoles
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
500 Internal Server Error.

POST

Summary

Create a new organization role in the logged user’s organization

Description

Create a new organization role in the logged user’s organization. Request Payload:

  • name: (required) The name of the user.
  • is_admin: (required) Whether this role is for admins or not.

This method validates that the role name is unique and not already in use.

Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
payload body Yes PostOrganizationRole
Responses
Code Description
201 Organization role successfully created.
400 Bad Request. Possible issues could be missing name or is_admin in payload.
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
500 Internal Server Error.

/api/v1/roles/{cuid}

GET

Summary

Retrieve a specific role from the logged user’s organization by CUID

Description

Retrieve a specific role by CUID within the logged user’s organization.

Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
cuid path Yes string
Responses
Code Description
200 Success.
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
404 Organization role not found.
500 Internal Server Error.

PATCH

Summary

Update specific organization role details in the logged user’s organization

Description

Update a specific role by CUID within the logged user’s organization. Request Payload:

  • name: (optional) New name of the user.
  • is_admin: (optional) New email of the user.

Partial updates are allowed.

Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
cuid path Yes string
payload body Yes PatchOrganizationRole
Responses
Code Description
200 User updated successfully.
400 Bad Request. Possible issues could be missing or invalid fields in payload.
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
404 Organization role not found.
500 Internal Server Error.

DELETE

Summary

Delete a specific role from the logged user’s organization by CUID

Description

Delete a specific role by CUID within the logged user’s organization.

Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
cuid path Yes string
Responses
Code Description
200 Organization role deleted successfully.
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
404 Organization role not found.
500 Internal Server Error.

users

User related operations

/api/v1/user-invites

GET

Summary

Retrieve a paginated list of user invitations from the logged-in user’s organization

Description

Fetch a paginated list of user invitation for the logged-in user’s organization. Query Parameters:

  • page: Page number for pagination (default is 1).
  • limit: Limit the number of items to be returned (default is 100).
  • sort_by: Sort by one of the available fields: ‘status’, ‘email’, ‘created_at’, ‘updated_at’ (default is ‘created_at’). # noqa
  • sort_order: Sort order, either ‘asc’ or ‘desc’ (default is ‘asc’).
  • search: Search term for users, uses ILIKE on ‘email’.
Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
page query Page number No integer
limit query Limit the number of items No integer
sort_by query Sort by this field No string
sort_order query Sort order No string
search query Search term using ILIKE on ‘name’ No string
status query Filter by status No string
X-Fields header An optional fields mask No string (mask)
Responses
Code Description Schema
200 Successful retrieval of user invitations. PaginatedUsers
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
500 Internal Server Error.

POST

Summary

Create a new user invite in the logged user’s organization

Description

Create a new user invite in the logged user’s organization. Request Payload:

  • email: (required) The email address of the user.
  • groups: (required) Array of group cuids.
  • roles: (required) Array of role cuids.

Validates:

  • All groups should belong to the organization
  • All roles should belong to the organization
  • User with the same email should not exist
  • User with the same email should not be invited already

Sends:

  • Email to the invited user with a link to accept the invitation
  • Zapier event to register the email to the whitelist
Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
payload body Yes PostUserInvite
Responses
Code Description
201 User invite successfully created.
400 Bad Request. Possible issues could be email already invited or user already exists.
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
402 Unauthorized. Subscription quota for ‘invite_users’ exceeds limit.
500 Internal Server Error.

/api/v1/user-invites/check

GET

Summary

Validate the state of the invitation

Description

Validate the state of the invitation. The invitation email contains a link with the invitation parameter.

For example: url/?invite=clnxbsrg50000tuyyv0p54mbe

Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
invite query Invitation cuid Yes string
X-Fields header An optional fields mask No string (mask)
Responses
Code Description Schema
200 Validation result InviteUserCheck

/api/v1/user-invites/{cuid}

DELETE

Summary

Delete a specific user invite by CUID within the logged user’s organization

Description

Delete a specific user invite by CUID within the logged user’s organization.

Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
cuid path Yes string
Responses
Code Description
200 User invite deleted successfully.
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
404 User invite not found.
500 Internal Server Error.

/api/v1/users

GET

Summary

Retrieve a paginated list of users from the logged-in user’s organization

Description

Fetch a paginated list of users from the logged-in user’s organization. Query Parameters:

  • page: Page number for pagination (default is 1).
  • limit: Limit the number of items to be returned (default is 100).
  • sort_by: Sort by one of the available fields: ‘name’, ‘email’, ‘created_at’, ‘updated_at’ (default is ‘name’). # noqa
  • sort_order: Sort order, either ‘asc’ or ‘desc’ (default is ‘asc’).
  • search: Search term for users, uses ILIKE on ‘name’ and ‘email’.
Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
page query Page number No integer
limit query Limit the number of items No integer
sort_by query Sort by this field No string
sort_order query Sort order No string
search query Search term using ILIKE on name and email No string
X-Fields header An optional fields mask No string (mask)
Responses
Code Description Schema
200 Successful retrieval of user list. PaginatedUsers
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
500 Internal Server Error.

POST

Summary

Create a new user in the logged user’s organization

Description

Create a new user in the logged user’s organization. Request Payload:

  • email: (required) The email address of the user.
  • name: (required) The name of the user.

This method validates that the email is unique and not already in use.

Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
payload body Yes PostUser
Responses
Code Description
201 User successfully created.
400 Bad Request. Possible issues could be missing email or name in payload.
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
500 Internal Server Error.

  • email: (optional) New email of the user.
  • name: (optional) New name of the user.

Partial updates are allowed.

user_roles

User roles related operations

/api/v1/user-roles

GET

Summary

Retrieve a paginated list of user roles from the logged-in user’s organization

Description

Fetch a paginated list of user roles from the logged-in user’s organization. Query Parameters:

  • page: Page number for pagination (default is 1).
  • limit: Limit the number of items to be returned (default is 100).
  • sort_by: Sort by one of the available fields: ‘created_at’, ‘updated_at’. # noqa
  • sort_order: Sort order, either ‘asc’ or ‘desc’ (default is ‘asc’).
  • user_id: Filter by user cuid
  • role_id: Filter by organization role cuid
Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
page query Page number No integer
limit query Limit the number of items No integer
sort_by query Sort by this field No string
sort_order query Sort order No string
user_id query Filter by user cuid No string
role_id query Filter by organization role cuid No string
X-Fields header An optional fields mask No string (mask)
Responses
Code Description Schema
200 Successful retrieval of user roles list. PaginatedUserRoles
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
500 Internal Server Error.

POST

Summary

Assigns an organization role to a user

Description

Create a new user role in the logged user’s organization. Request Payload:

  • user_id: (required) The User cuid to assign the role to
  • role_id: (required) The Role cuid

This method validates:

  • The user and role exists.
  • User and Role is already set.

To update a user role, better use DELETE and POST methods.

Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
payload body Yes PostUserRole
Responses
Code Description
201 User role successfully created.
400 Bad Request. Possible issues could be missing user_id or role_id in payload.
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
500 Internal Server Error.

/api/v1/user-roles/{cuid}

GET

Summary

Retrieve a specific user role from the logged user’s organization by CUID

Description

Retrieve a specific user role by CUID within the logged user’s organization.

Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
cuid path Yes string
Responses
Code Description
200 Success.
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
404 User role not found.
500 Internal Server Error.

DELETE

Summary

Delete a specific user role from the logged user’s organization by CUID

Description

Delete a specific user role by CUID within the logged user’s organization.

  • Use for removing assigned roles from users.
Parameters
Name Located in Description Required Schema
cuid path Yes string
Responses
Code Description
200 User deleted successfully.
401 Unauthorized. Authorization header required.
404 User role not found.
500 Internal Server Error.
